title: Allow odds input fields to be emptied without auto-filling

requirements.text: Modify ContenderOddsRow component to allow the numerator input field to be completely empty without auto-filling with '1'. The input should accept an empty string state and only validate/compute implied probability when a valid number (1-30) is entered.

quotes: They should be empty by default. As it stands, if I try to empty a feild, it auto fills with a 1, so I am unable to replace the 1 with anything else. Make it emptyable.

acceptanceCriteria: User can click into an odds input field and delete all content, leaving it completely empty
Empty input fields do not auto-fill with '1' or any other value
Implied probability calculation only displays when a valid number (1-30) is present
User can type a new number into an empty field without the previous value reappearing
All 6 contender input fields should start empty by default when the New Bet page loads

constraints: Do not change the validation range (1-30) for odds numerators
Maintain real-time implied probability calculation when valid odds are entered
Keep the visual format of '[input] /1' with static '/1' text
nonGoals: Modifying the layout or styling of the input rows
Adding new validation rules beyond allowing empty state
